column5: Won't be posting results on line, won't be taking anyone else with me or telling anyone else where to go. Just want to go for an evening fish and perhaps catch a small rainbow for Sue for supper.  Don't have waders, would appreciate any help, please PM me if you care to share.  Will gladly return the favor if I ever can!  Leaving from Lindsay and heading South tomorrow afternoon/evening
Boot size Cliff?  I may have some hip waders you can use.
Do hip waders come with a boot and a belly size rating? lol  Best of luck on the Rainbows Cliff   Art
Size 10 boots XXL for the belly LOL.  Many Many thanks to those that took the time to PM me! It is very much appreciated!
South of Lindsay you say...are your buddy's trout ponds free of ice ???
No Beans I don't think they are, besides, there are no trout left in them, they haven't restocked in years.
